ThingDef.label: rustic round stool
ThingDef.description: A simple platform on which to sit. Not very comfortable, but much better than nothing.Commonly seen at taverns and inns. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: rustic chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: end table
ThingDef.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: candles
ThingDef.description: A candle to prevent darkness seeping in your room. Can be refueled with animal tallow.

ThingDef.label: candle stand
ThingDef.description: A candle stand to prevent darkness seeping in your room. Can be refueled with tallow.

ThingDef.label: chest
ThingDef.description: A trusty wooden chest to store your personal belongings. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside. Multiple chests do not stack comfort bonuses.

ThingDef.label: metal strongbox
ThingDef.description: A trusty metal strongbox to store your personal belongings. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.Multiple chests do not stack comfort bonuses.

ThingDef.label: royal chest
ThingDef.description: An ornate chest store by the nobles. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside. Multiple chests do not stack comfort bonuses.

ThingDef.label: dresser
ThingDef.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: closet
ThingDef.description: A closet to store clothes efficiently and beautifully. Place near beds for a slight comfort bonus

ThingDef.label: bookshelf
ThingDef.description: Increases research speed when placed near research table. Each research bench can use two bookshelf.

ThingDef.label: wicker bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make wicker bed.

ThingDef.label: double wicker bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make wicker bed.

ThingDef.label: Straw bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make wicker bed, padded with straw for added comfort.

ThingDef.label: double straw bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make wicker bed, padded with straw for added comfort.

ThingDef.label: fur bed
ThingDef.description: A cozy bed made from pieces of soft and comfy fur.

ThingDef.label: double fur bed
ThingDef.description: A cozy double-wide bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: wood burning stove
ThingDef.description: A small wood burning stove to heat up a small room.

ThingDef.label: hearth
ThingDef.description: A stone hearth for warmth and a homey atmosphere.
